pageSetting.title: 参与社团贷款账户管理导入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from jxdx_dkzh d where rtrim(t.zhdh)=rtrim(d.zhdh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'账户名称输入错误，长度不能超过:30!' where f_java_rule_length(t.zhhm)>30 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'备注说明输入错误，长度不能超过:200!' where f_java_rule_length(t.bzsm)>200 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_DKZHKZSX2 tar where 1=1 and t.zhdh =tar.ZHDH and 'MZ' =tar.ZHKZSX and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update cystdkzhgldr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select zhdh from cystdkzhgldr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by zhdh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.zhdh=dr.zhdh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE cystdkzhgldr_temp ( zhdh varchar(100) , zhhm varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from cystdkzhgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from cystdkzhgldr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,bzsm,khdxdh,error from cystdkzhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,bzsm,khdxdh,error from cystdkzhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, zhdh,zhhm,bzsm,khdxdh,error from cystdkzhgldr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_DKZHKZSX2(ZHDH,ZHKZSX,SXZ,BZSM,CZR,CZSJ) select t.zhdh ,'MZ',1, t.bzsm ,$login_khdxdh$,F_GET_SYSTIME() from cystdkzhgldr_temp t where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null)
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_DKZHKZSX2 tar where exists(select 1 from cystdkzhgldr_temp t where 1=1 and t.zhdh=tar.ZHDH and 'MZ' =tar.ZHKZSX and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
